description: The Department of National Defense has a requirement for temporary help services and has issued a request for proposal to suppliers who have qualifies under the following stream and category: Stream 5.1 - Computer Application Support
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Contract Title
National Capital Region (NCR) - Temporary Help Services

## Contract Announcement Details
- **Contract Reference Number**: cb-7406-32787841
- **Contract Amendment Number**: 1
- **Contract Solicitation Number**: S4566807
- **Publication Date**: 2023-07-20
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-26T15:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: 2023-07-26
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-09-05
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-08-05
- **Contract Status**: Expired
- **Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN)**: None
- **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Contract Description
The Department of National Defense (DND) requires temporary help services to support computer application support activities. This contract is open to qualified suppliers who have a prior Supply Arrangement (SA) with the Canadian government. The contract involves providing temporary personnel services to support the DND in the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Contract Security Requirements
The required minimum security level for resources is Secret.

## Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Regions of Opportunity
The contract is limited to the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Contracting Entity
- **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of National Defense
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON, Canada K2H8G1

## Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP), are available on the Canada Buys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7406/s4566807--rfp-%28english-version_0_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7406/s4566807--rfp-%28english-version_0_0.pdf).

Note: The contracting entity, regions of opportunity, and contact information remain the same as the original abbreviated release. The end user entities name and address are excluded since it is empty in original text and no clear policy is mentioned to use information
